short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds simple functionality to Skyscanner: indicates whether flight arrives during day- or nighttime

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds additional information to Skyscanner ticket search page. For the departure and arrival time of each flight it shows whether it is during day time, night time or at dawn/dusk.
